title: ISic001367. I.Sicily inscription 001367
body:
Facsimile Images

⳨⳨⳨
1ΕΝΘΑΔΕΚΙΤΕ
2ΡΟΔΙΝΗΕΖΗΣΕΝ
3ΕΤΗΕΙ[.]ΟΣΙΠΕΝ
4ΕΤΕΛΕΥΤΗΣΕΝ
5ΔΕΤΗΠΡΟΙΑ´ΕΙ
6ΔΩΝΝΟΒΕΜΒΡΙ
7ΩΝ        alphachristogramomega

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of IGPalermo but corrected against photograph; note that Kaibel followed Alessi's apograph, which does not observe the original layout.;
  • line.5: Alessi: ΠΡΟΤΑ; Kirchoff: προτ[έρ]ᾳ; Manni Piraino: πρὸ ⟨ι⟩α’; the two numerals ι α are clearly distinguished by interpuncts and a line above, which joins the top of the iota (whence misinterpretation as Τ).

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0548 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000531
  • 4.9484 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • Alessi 1833 229 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002538
  • Alessi 1833 174 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002540
